appName: Shark Attack - VR Sea Hunting Game
displayName: Shark Attack - VR Sea Hunting Game
display_name: Shark Attack - VR Sea Hunting Game
display_long_description:
Dive into the ocean and become the ultimate predator in Shark Attack – VR Sea Hunting Game. This immersive VR adventure transforms you into a deadly shark on a mission to hunt, chase, and survive in the deep blue sea. Explore vibrant underwater environments filled with fish, obstacles, and hidden dangers as you rise to the top of the food chain.

Swim freely using intuitive VR movement and feel the thrill of fast-paced underwater action. Track down fish, attack with precision, and unleash powerful feeding frenzy moments. The more you eat, the stronger you become. But stay alert—larger predators and sudden threats can turn the hunt into a fight for survival.

Perfect for players who enjoy ocean games, creature survival, and high-energy VR experiences. With immersive visuals, smooth controls, and dynamic sea life, every dive feels exciting and unpredictable.

Become the apex hunter. Rule the waters. Experience the ocean like never before in Shark Attack – VR Sea Hunting Game.
